mediaItems.title: Ragnarok
mediaItems.description: In a Norwegian town poisoned by pollution and rattled by melting glaciers, the end times feel all too real. Only a legendary hero can stop an ancient evil.

mediaItems.title: Five Feet Apart
mediaItems.description: Two teenagers with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, but their disease means they must avoid close physical contact.

mediaItems.title: The Walking Dead
mediaItems.description: In the wake of a zombie apocalypse, survivors struggle to stay alive and adapt in a world overrun by the undead.

mediaItems.title: Ava
mediaItems.description: A deadly assassin named Ava works for a black ops organization, traveling the globe specializing in high-profile hits. When a job goes dangerously wrong, she is forced to fight for her own survival.

mediaItems.title: Extraction
mediaItems.description: A fearless black market mercenary embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

mediaItems.title: Rick and Morty
mediaItems.description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson as they explore the universe.

mediaItems.title: See
mediaItems.description: In a future where humankind has lost the ability to see, society has found new ways to interact, build, hunt, and survive. That is until a set of twins is born with the ability to see.

mediaItems.title: Machine Gun Preacher
mediaItems.description: Sam Childers, a former drug-dealing biker, finds God and becomes a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

mediaItems.title: Outside the Wire
mediaItems.description: In the near future, a drone pilot is sent into a deadly militarized zone and must work with an android officer to locate a doomsday device.

mediaItems.title: Sweet Tooth
mediaItems.description: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

mediaItems.title: Blue Miracle
mediaItems.description: To save their orphanage, a guardian and his kids partner with a washed-up boat captain for a chance to win a lucrative fishing competition.

mediaItems.title: Wednesday
mediaItems.description: Wednesday: Created by Alfred Gough, Miles Millar. With Jenna Ortega, Hunter Doohan, Emma Myers, Joy Sunday. Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student.
